title: Johnny Vegas: Organized Crime Trilogy #2
description: Trouble has always had a way of finding Johnny Tee. Now a changed man, he is heading to a place where nothing could possibly go wrong: Las Vegas. With $120 in his pocket and with no logical reasoning whatsoever at his disposal, he is out to make a better life for himself. He's about to have a really bad 24 hours.
author: Nick Tory
